text: chaur anak( mou ham meat) pol tha khnhom min del chuobabrateah now knong avei del a l laoh ban phdal vea hi aoy khnhom nouv kar bamream towleu anak del chng briphok vea( satv del puok anak hamkhat) noh te leuk leng te vea klaycha satv slab( daoy poum ban saamleh tamochbab ai sla m) ryy chheam del haur ryy sach chrouk piproh vea chea robsa kakhvak ryy chea robsa del min srabachbab del trauv ban ke saamleh vea daoy romluk neam phe sang pi a l laoh . bo nde bae bokkol na trauv ban bangkham chetd( knong kar ttuol tean) daoy kmean leusa pi tamrouvkar chabach ning min romlophbampean te noh ku pitabrakd nasa mcheasa robsa anak mha aphytosa mha anet sraleanh
